XIV.4.C.3.a
.
When to Take Final Action
Do not take final action until a reasonable income verification process is completed.  In most cases, the verification process is considered completed when the compressed letter is sent to the beneficiary and the 60-day response period has expired.
Note
:  In all cases, final action may be taken prior to the expiration of the 60-day due process period if the beneficiary waives the due process rights.
Reference
:  For an example of when further development may be required, see
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.C.3.d
.
